sections.heading: Statutory Thresholds for Settlements Involving Minors Act, how cited
sections.text: Sections 25-3108 to 25-3110 shall be known and cited as the Nebraska Statutory Thresholds for Settlements Involving Minors Act.SourceLaws 2025, LB341, ยง 1.Effective Date: September 3, 2025

sections.heading: 25-3108 to 25-3110 shall be known and cited as the Nebraska Statutory Thresholds for Settlements Involving Minors Act.
